/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. On the right side of the photo, trees add a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
